title: Home Based Internet Business For Sale
text: Questions Business Summary Internet Business specializing in Online Garment Decorating. Business is very easy run, truly turnkey, home based and can be run and managed by one owner on part time or full time basis. This Business offers custom manufactured custom built to order unique transfer designs. These designs are a great way to show off your business logos, team sports, special event graphic or even custom text in style. Business can be taken in many directions and all of the equipment is included in sales price. Very desirable website included and this business is positioned for huge growth for new owner. Current owner is retiring, currently has health issues, and are moving so they no longer have time to dedicate to business. Selling Price: $23,000. For more information, please contact Christopher Ververis @ 727-725-7090. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: Sellers Discretionary Cash Inventory: $43,000
